reviews.review: Best nostalgic cs ever that u can always enjoy. Best game
I`m in love with this game <3

Been playing this game since I was a kid.

It's 2017, and I still love this game. No apologies.
This time, you don't have to learn Russian to play this game.
Best agem 10/10, grapics 10/10, sound 10/10, Just the best game on the market.
I don't stop to play this game. Thanks for Counter Strike!
gud game 10/10 would drop awp again
So mutch time has passed and still awesome game.
